L

Library - Class in cm.view
Display a list of stored Stats and allows for adding to an encounter.
Library() - Constructor for class cm.view.Library
Creates a default library view.
Library(StatLibrary, Frame) - Constructor for class cm.view.Library
Creates a library view using the provided statblock, and with the provided frame as the parent.
loadCombos() - Method in class cm.view.EffectWin
Loads combo boxes with lists of fighters.
loadDefaults() - Static method in class cm.model.Settings
Loads default values for the application settings.
loadEffectsToList() - Method in class cm.view.SavingThrows
Loads the list of effects to the UI.
loadEncounter(Boolean) - Method in class cm.view.MainFrame
Loads or imports an encounter.
loadFromCBFile(String) - Method in class cm.model.Stats
Loads a statblock from a Character Builder dnd4e file.
loadFromFile(String, Boolean) - Method in class cm.model.Encounter
Loads encounter data from a file.
loadFromFile(String, Boolean) - Method in class cm.model.StatLibrary
Reads a statblock library from an XML file.
loadFromMonsterFile(String) - Method in class cm.model.Stats
Loads a statblock from an Adventure Tools monster file.
loadHistory() - Method in class cm.view.EffectWin
Loads effect history into the effect list.
loadPowersToList() - Method in class cm.view.RechargeWin
Loads powers from the table into the UI.
LOG - Static variable in class cm.util.StatLogger
Output log.
logDamage(Integer, String, String, Integer) - Static method in class cm.util.StatLogger
Write stats to the log: round,source,target,damage_amount.
logDeath(Integer, String, String) - Static method in class cm.util.StatLogger
Write stats to the log: round,source,target,DEAD.
logOA(String) - Static method in class cm.util.StatLogger
Write informational message to log, indicating previous message was an opportunity attack by a different fighter.
lookupItem(String) - Method in class cm.util.external.AutoCompletion
